    • getUTCFromLocal

      public static String getUTCFromLocal(String year, String month, String day, String hour, String minute)
      Parameters:
      year - - the selected year
      month - - the selected month
      day - - the selected day
      hour - - the selected hour
      minute - - the selected minute
      Returns:
      - The time passed to it as a single datetime string in UTC

    • getLocalFromUTC

      public static String getLocalFromUTC(String UTCtime)
      Parameters:
      UTCtime - - a dateTime string in UTC
      Returns:
      - a dateTime string in the user's local time.

    • getEndTime

      public static String getEndTime(String startTime, String duration)
      Parameters:
      startTime - - the time duration will be added to.
      duration - - the amount of time to be added to startTime
      Returns:
      - endTime, the startTime + duration.

    • breakDownTime

      public static String breakDownTime(String time, String result)
      Parameters:
      time - - The time to be broken down
      result - - The part of the time to be returned, (year, month, day, hour, minute)
      Returns:
      - The selected part of the passed time.

    • getDuration

      public static String getDuration(String start, String end)
      Parameters:
      start - - Start time
      end - - End time
      Returns:
      - The amount of time between the start and end time.

    • withinBusinessHours

      public static boolean withinBusinessHours(String time)
      Parameters:
      time - - the time to be checked
      Returns:
      - true if the time is within business hours, false if it is not.

    • upcomingAppointment

      public static boolean upcomingAppointment(DBAppointments appointment)
      Parameters:
      appointment - the DBAppointments Object that the start time is being extracted from
      Returns:
      true if the appointment starts within 15 minutes, false if the appointment does not.

    • inPast

      public static boolean inPast(String time)
      Parameters:
      time - A string holding the appointment time
      Returns:
      - true if the appointment is in the future, false if it is in the past
